post.summary:
The Customer Account will be moved immediately under the provided Customer.\n" +
                    "All open wallet operation will be rerated.
post.description:
The Customer Account will be moved immediately under the provided Customer.
All open wallet operation will be rerated.

No consistency check is performed, no other data is modified.
Especially:

counters (accumulators) set on the origin or target Customer will not be updated to reflect the move

custom fields referencing entities in the origin hierarchy will not be updated

Unless specifically developed to use field history, reports will use the customer at the time of execution

204.description: resource successfully updated but not content exposed except the hypermedia

post.summary: Launch all the invoicing process for a given billingAccount
post.description:
Launch all the invoicing process for a given billingAccount, that's mean.
  • Create rated transactions
  • Create an exceptional billingRun with given dates
  • Validate the pre-invoicing report
  • Validate the post-invoicing report
  • Validate the BillingRun

parameters.name: extractList
parameters.description: extractList flag to return or not nested List

requestBody.description: requestDto carries the wanted fields ex: {genericFields = [code, description]}

200.description: paginated results successfully retrieved with hypermedia links

400.description: bad request when entityName not well formed or entity unrecognized

get.summary: This endpoint is used to retrieve the full list of queryable entities
get.description: This endpoint retrieves all possible queryable entities in the database.

200.description: paginated results successfully retrieved with hypermedia links

404.description: the full list of entities not found

get.summary: This endpoint is used to retrieve the fields and corresponding types of an entity
get.description:
You need to specify an entity name. 

Given the entity name, this endpoint returns the list of its fields and corresponding types. The entity name should not be written in the plural form. For example, *customer*.

200.description: paginated results successfully retrieved with hypermedia links

404.description: the full list of entities not found

status.example: possible value are: OPEN, BILLED, REJECTED, RERATED, CANCELED

skipValidation.description: Indicate if the invoice line will skip validation

CategoryInvoiceAgregate.description: The list of the caregory invoice agregates

discountPlanItemCode.description: The code of discount plan item

invoiceLines.description: The list of the invoice lines

paymentStatusDate.description: The date of the payment status

paymentMethodType.example: possible value are: CHECK, DIRECTDEBIT, WIRETRANSFER, CARD, PAYPAL, STRIPE, CASH

paymentStatus.example:
possible value are :
  • NONE : invoice has no payment status, no AO created.
  • PENDING : AO created, due date is still in the future
  • PAID : invoice has no payment status, no AO created.
  • PPAID : invoice has no payment status, no AO created
  • UNPAID : invoice has no payment status, no AO created.
  • ABANDONED : invoice has no payment status, no AO created.
  • REFUNDED : invoice has no payment status, no AO created.
  • DISPUTED : invoice has no payment status, no AO created.

status.example:
possible value are :
  • NEW : invoice entity has been created but incomplete
  • SUSPECT : invoice has been marked as suspect by automatic controls (this status doesn’t block automatic generation)
  • REJECTED : invoice has been rejected by automatic controls (this status block automatic generation)
  • DRAFT : invoice is complete but not validated. It can be edited.
  • CANCELED : invoice has been canceled (all related rated transactions are released. This is a final status)
  • VALIDATED : invoice is validated and cannot be edited anymore (this a final status)

detailedInvoice.description: Indicate if the invoice is detailed

alreadyAppliedMinimum.description: Indicate if the invoice is already applied minumun

alreadyAddedDiscount.description: Indicate if the invoice is discount already added

alreadySent.description: Indicate if the invoice is already sent

dontSend.description: Indicate if the invoice doesnt send

draft.description: Indicate if the invoice is draft

prepaid.description: Indicate if the invoice is a prepaid

isIncludeBalance.description: Indicate if we want include balance to the invoice

isAutoValidation.description: Indicate if the invoice set auto validation

isVirtual.description: Indicate if the invoice is virtual

isDraft.description: Indicate if the invoice is DRAFT

invoiceSubCategoryCode.description: The code of invoice sub category

Tax.description: The tax attachaed to sub category invoice agregate amount

InvoiceLineRTs.description: Containing list of invoice line Ids to replicate in the new adjustment.

invoiceLinesRTs.description: Containing list of invoice line Ids to replicate in the new adjustment.

invoiceLinesIds.description: Containing list of invoice line Ids to replicate in the new adjustment.

items.description: Containing list of invoice line Ids to replicate in the new adjustment.

matchingStatus.example: possible value are: O, L, P, C, I, R

status.example: possible value are : POSTED, REJECTED, EXPORTED

reason.example: possible value are : REJECTED, FORCED, CLOSED_PERIOD

status.description: Tells whether the instance of this status object is ok or not

message.description: A detailed error message if applicable, can contain the entity id that was created

entityId.description: The entity identifier after creation of an entity

entityCode.description: The entity code after creation of an entity

nrAffected.description: Number of items/records affected by the action

listSubCategoryInvoiceAgregateDto.description: List of Sub category invoice aggregates

amountsByTax.description: List of amounts broken down by tax

status.example: possible value are : NEW, SUSPECT, REJECTED, DRAFT, CANCELED, VALIDATED

listInvoiceIdToLink.description: The list invoice id to link

items.description: The list invoice id to link

paymentMethod.example: possible value are : CHECK, DIRECTDEBIT, WIRETRANSFER, CARD, PAYPAL, STRIPE, CASH

autoValidation.description: A request-only parameter. True if invoice should be assigned a number

returnXml.description: A request-only parameter. True if XML invoice should be generated and returned

returnPdf.description: A request-only parameter. True if PDF invoice should be generated and returned

sendByEmail.description: A request-only parameter. True if PDF should be delivered by email. Defaults to True

includeBalance.description: A request-only parameter. True if currently due balance should be returned

dueBalance.description: The total due is a snapshot at invoice generation time of the due balance (not exigible) before invoice calculation+invoice amount. Due balance is a 'future' dueBalance (the due balance at the invoice due date)

isDraft.description: A flag to generate a draft invoice

checkAlreadySent.description: Before sending the invoice, check if not already sent

overrideEmail.description: Override Email defined in the billing entity

sentByEmail.description: True if the invoice was sent by email or delibered by some other electronic means, false otherwise

realTimeStatus.example: possible value are: NONE, PENDING, PAID, PPAID, UNPAID, ABANDONED, REFUNDED, DISPUTED

ratedTransactionsToLink.description: List of existing RTs to include, identified by id This option is allowed only if invoiceMode=='DETAILLED'

items.description: List of existing RTs to include, identified by id This option is allowed only if invoiceMode=='DETAILLED'

xmlDate.description: Date when the XML has been produced on a validated invoice

pdfDate.description: Date when the PDf has been produced on a validated invoice

emailSentDate.description: Date when the invoice has been sent for a validated invoice

paymentStatus.example: possible value are: NONE, PENDING, PAID, PPAID, UNPAID, ABANDONED, REFUNDED, DISPUTED

startDate.description: Beginning of the billed period (based on billing cycle period whenever possible or min(invoiceLine.valueDate))

endDate.description: End of the billed period (based on billing cycle period whenever possible or applied lastTransactionDate or max(invoiceLine.valueDate))

rawAmount.description:
Total raw amount from invoice lines.
  • Does not include discount
  • With or without tax depending on provider setting (isEnterprise)

discountRate.description:
Discount rate to apply (in %).

Initialize with discount rate from linked invoice discount plan

discountAmount.description:
Total discount amount with or without tax depending on provider settings.

Can be inconsistent with discountRate.

discountAmount has precedence over discountRate

lastAppliedRate.description: The exchange rate that converted amounts of the invoice.

lastAppliedRateDate.description: The date of exchange rate applied to amounts of the invoice.

matchingType.example: possible value are: A, M, A_TIP, A_DERICT_DEBIT

matchingStatus.example: possible value are: O, L, P, C, I, R

status.example: possible value are : POSTED, REJECTED, EXPORTED

reason.example: possible value are : REJECTED, FORCED, CLOSED_PERIOD

fullTextFilter.description: Full text search filter. Mutually exclusive with filters attribute. fullTextFilter has priority

additionalProperties.description: Search filters (key = Filter key, value = search pattern or value).
additionalProperties.example:
• invoice number equals '1578AU': Filter key: invoiceNumber. Filter value: 1578AU
  • invoice number is not '1578AU': Filter key: ne invoiceNumber. Filter value: 1578AU
  • invoice number is null: Filter key: invoiceNumber. Filter value: IS_NULL
  • invoice number is not empty: Filter key: invoiceNumber. Filter value: IS_NOT_NULL
  • Invoice date is between 2017-05-01 and 2017-06-01: Filter key: fromRange invoiceDate. Filter value: 2017-05-01 Filter key: toRange invoiceDate. Filter value: 2017-06-01
  • Date is between creation and update dates: Filter key: minmaxRange audit.created audit.updated. Filter value: 2017-05-25
  • invoice number is any of 158AU, 159KU or 189LL: Filter key: inList invoiceNumber. Filter value: 158AU,159KU,189LL
  • any of param1, param2 or param3 fields contains 'energy': Filter key: wildcardOr param1 param2 param3. Filter value: energy
  • any of param1, param2 or param3 fields start with 'energy': Filter key: likeCriterias param1 param2 param3. Filter value: *energy
  • any of param1, param2 or param3 fields is 'energy': Filter key: likeCriterias param1 param2 param3. Filter value: energy

jsonSchema.description: Search filters (key = Filter key, value = search pattern or value).
jsonSchema.example:
• invoice number equals '1578AU': Filter key: invoiceNumber. Filter value: 1578AU
  • invoice number is not '1578AU': Filter key: ne invoiceNumber. Filter value: 1578AU
  • invoice number is null: Filter key: invoiceNumber. Filter value: IS_NULL
  • invoice number is not empty: Filter key: invoiceNumber. Filter value: IS_NOT_NULL
  • Invoice date is between 2017-05-01 and 2017-06-01: Filter key: fromRange invoiceDate. Filter value: 2017-05-01 Filter key: toRange invoiceDate. Filter value: 2017-06-01
  • Date is between creation and update dates: Filter key: minmaxRange audit.created audit.updated. Filter value: 2017-05-25
  • invoice number is any of 158AU, 159KU or 189LL: Filter key: inList invoiceNumber. Filter value: 158AU,159KU,189LL
  • any of param1, param2 or param3 fields contains 'energy': Filter key: wildcardOr param1 param2 param3. Filter value: energy
  • any of param1, param2 or param3 fields start with 'energy': Filter key: likeCriterias param1 param2 param3. Filter value: *energy
  • any of param1, param2 or param3 fields is 'energy': Filter key: likeCriterias param1 param2 param3. Filter value: energy

filters.description: Search filters (key = Filter key, value = search pattern or value).
filters.example:
• invoice number equals '1578AU': Filter key: invoiceNumber. Filter value: 1578AU
  • invoice number is not '1578AU': Filter key: ne invoiceNumber. Filter value: 1578AU
  • invoice number is null: Filter key: invoiceNumber. Filter value: IS_NULL
  • invoice number is not empty: Filter key: invoiceNumber. Filter value: IS_NOT_NULL
  • Invoice date is between 2017-05-01 and 2017-06-01: Filter key: fromRange invoiceDate. Filter value: 2017-05-01 Filter key: toRange invoiceDate. Filter value: 2017-06-01
  • Date is between creation and update dates: Filter key: minmaxRange audit.created audit.updated. Filter value: 2017-05-25
  • invoice number is any of 158AU, 159KU or 189LL: Filter key: inList invoiceNumber. Filter value: 158AU,159KU,189LL
  • any of param1, param2 or param3 fields contains 'energy': Filter key: wildcardOr param1 param2 param3. Filter value: energy
  • any of param1, param2 or param3 fields start with 'energy': Filter key: likeCriterias param1 param2 param3. Filter value: *energy
  • any of param1, param2 or param3 fields is 'energy': Filter key: likeCriterias param1 param2 param3. Filter value: energy

jsonSchema.description: Search filters (key = Filter key, value = search pattern or value).
jsonSchema.example:
• invoice number equals '1578AU': Filter key: invoiceNumber. Filter value: 1578AU
  • invoice number is not '1578AU': Filter key: ne invoiceNumber. Filter value: 1578AU
  • invoice number is null: Filter key: invoiceNumber. Filter value: IS_NULL
  • invoice number is not empty: Filter key: invoiceNumber. Filter value: IS_NOT_NULL
  • Invoice date is between 2017-05-01 and 2017-06-01: Filter key: fromRange invoiceDate. Filter value: 2017-05-01 Filter key: toRange invoiceDate. Filter value: 2017-06-01
  • Date is between creation and update dates: Filter key: minmaxRange audit.created audit.updated. Filter value: 2017-05-25
  • invoice number is any of 158AU, 159KU or 189LL: Filter key: inList invoiceNumber. Filter value: 158AU,159KU,189LL
  • any of param1, param2 or param3 fields contains 'energy': Filter key: wildcardOr param1 param2 param3. Filter value: energy
  • any of param1, param2 or param3 fields start with 'energy': Filter key: likeCriterias param1 param2 param3. Filter value: *energy
  • any of param1, param2 or param3 fields is 'energy': Filter key: likeCriterias param1 param2 param3. Filter value: energy
